name: Heart of Dice
description:
Heart of Dice was made for the GMTK 2022 Game Jam in 48 hours.

Pre-story: You were a casino owner. One night you got alcohol poisoning and you passed out. Because you were running your business unfairly, you were sent to Hell. Satan offered you to beat his 3 best demons in a game of Dice. If you win against them, he would send you back to Earth. You accepted the deal.

The game includes 3 unique rivals you can defeat by rolling a dice... but there is a catch. You get 3 special dices:

- High Roll Dice - gives you 20% chance to roll +1 point to your next roll
- Fifty Fifty - you get 50% to either win or lose 3 points 
- Second Chance - a bonus roll

These dices can change the course of your battles, either for the better or for the worse. 

Your goal - defeat the rivals.

Good luck, and may the RNG Gods be with you! ;)
